page.title: 05MY MUM,MAYORESS,BOLTON 84-85
page.content: I was very excited when I heard that my mother was going to be Mayoress and my grandmother was to be Mr.Mayor.Half of the year my mother was mayoress and the other half my aunt was.I got many unusual trips in the Mayoral car which is a Daimler Jaguar.It is very comfortable and quiet.On one of our journeys we went to Bolton Fire Station and it was very interesting. Life changed a lot at school and whenever I mentioned the words Mayor or Mayoress I was said to be boasting or showing off.Eventually I got used to it.Sometimes it was quite useful because occasionally I got time off school.The first time this happened I had to go to see my grandmother in the Council Chamber.She sometimes got very firm and often shouted at the other councillors arguing.
